has been organized in [emf_revolt_origin.GetName] with military coordination from the many peasants aligned with their cause in the nearby provinces of [emf_revolt_prov2.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov3.GetName], and [emf_revolt_prov4.GetName]

has been organized in [emf_revolt_origin.GetName] with military coordination from the many peasants aligned with their cause in the nearby provinces of [emf_revolt_prov2.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov3.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov4.GetName], and [emf_revolt_prov5.GetName]

has been organized in [emf_revolt_origin.GetName] with military coordination from the many peasants aligned with their cause in the nearby provinces of [emf_revolt_prov2.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov3.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov4.GetName], [emf_revolt_prov5.GetName], and more

The formerly lowborn leader of a recently successful [Root.EMF_GetPastRevoltType] rebellion, [Root.GetFirstName], has carved out [Root.GetPossPronoun] own new realm, the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!, while Root.GetSubjectPronoun] now styles [Root.GetHerselfHimself] §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!.\n\nThrough sheer demonstrated force during the rebellion as well as the enthusiasm of [Root.GetPossPronoun] now even more numerous followers, the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is currently enjoying a period of uncommon strength for its size, but its continued existence still seems unknown to all. From pitchforks and makeshift helmets to finely-forged swords and jeweled crowns, can the new realm survive -- or even thrive?
